## KvMathOperator

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/kv/kv.ts" sourceLine="10" packageName="commandkit" />

Mathematical operators supported by the KV math method

```ts title="Signature"
type KvMathOperator = '+' | '-' | '*' | '/' | '^' | '%'
```
